actverse 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

Read/Write

read_acttrust()

Read, tidy, and validate an ActTrust file

write_acttrust()

Adapt and write a tsibble to a readable ActTrust file

Period analysis

periodogram()

Compute Sokolove & Bushell's \(\chi^{2}\) periodogram

spectrogram()

Compute a spectrogram based on Sokolove & Bushell's periodogram

Data interpolation

na_approx() na_locf() na_overall_mean() na_overall_median() na_overall_mode() na_spline() na_weekly_mean() na_zero() na_plot()

Replace NA by interpolation

API clients

get_from_zenodo()

Get data from a Zenodo record

get_sun_stats()

Get sun related statistics from different APIs

Data

acttrust

An ActTrust actigraphy record

Utilities

aggregate_index()

Aggregate the index of a tsibble

find_epoch()

Find the epochs/periodicities in a tsibble

raw_data()

Get paths to actverse raw datasets
